name: Travel Backpack
desc: Durable and spacious, perfect for week-long adventures.
longDesc: This backpack is designed for travelers who need both comfort and storage. With multiple compartments and padded straps, it’s perfect for day trips or extended journeys.

name: Packing Cubes Set
desc: Organize your luggage with ease using this 6-piece compression set.
longDesc: This packing cube set helps you optimize space and stay organized while traveling. Ideal for carry-ons and long trips alike, the cubes are made of durable fabric and see-through mesh so you can quickly find what you need.
features: Durable nylon with breathable mesh panels
Smooth double zippers for easy access
Varied sizes for clothes, toiletries, and accessories

name: Universal Travel Adapter
desc: Worldwide compatibility with built-in USB ports and surge protection.
longDesc: A must-have for international travel, this adapter supports plugs in over 150 countries and includes built-in USB ports for charging multiple devices.

name: Neck Pillow & Eye Mask Set
desc: Memory foam neck pillow and light-blocking eye mask for long flights.
longDesc: Enjoy restful sleep during long journeys with this supportive neck pillow and ultra-soft eye mask combo. Designed for portability and comfort.

name: Refillable Toiletry Bottles
desc: 4-pack of TSA-approved leak-proof silicone travel bottles.
longDesc: Carry your shampoo, lotion, or sanitizer with ease. These leak-proof silicone bottles are TSA-compliant and reusable for all types of liquids.

name: Waterproof Travel Pouch
desc: Secure passport, cash, and valuables while exploring new cities.
longDesc: This lightweight travel pouch keeps your essentials safe and accessible. Ideal for sightseeing, day trips, or storing your phone and documents.

name: NYC Subway Map Hoodie
desc: Stylish and cozy hoodie printed with the iconic NYC subway map — a hit with tourists and locals alike.
longDesc: Show your NYC pride with this bold and graphic hoodie. The subway map print is not just stylish — it’s also surprisingly helpful.

name: Singapore EZ-Link Tourist Card
desc: Preloaded transit card for Singapore's MRT, LRT, and buses. Easy and essential for navigating the city.
longDesc: Simplify your travel in Singapore with this reloadable EZ-Link card, accepted on all public transportation. A perfect companion for first-time visitors.
features: Accepted on MRT, LRT, and buses

name: World City Postcard Set
desc: A premium 10-piece postcard collection featuring scenes from both NYC and Singapore.
longDesc: This beautifully printed postcard set captures urban landscapes, culture, and charm of two iconic cities. Ideal for sending home or collecting.

name: More Items Coming Soon
desc: Check back later for exciting new travel gear.
longDesc: We're working on adding new products to our shop. Stay tuned!
